subject: Leadership
title: Role Clarity
description: A quick win: understand Role Clarity.

hook.text: Two team members both think the other is handling the client update. Neither does. The client is furious.

buildup.text: Role ambiguity is a top cause of team conflict. When ownership is unclear, tasks fall through the cracks.

discovery.text: The RACI model assigns Responsible, Accountable, Consulted, and Informed roles. Clarity prevents overlap and gaps.

twist.text: Too much rigidity backfires. Roles should guide, not cage. The best teams flex roles based on context and skill.

climax.text: Leaders clarify roles at the start and revisit as projects evolve. Static maps for dynamic work cause friction.

punchline.text: Clear roles don't limit collaboration. They enable it.

quiz.question: What does the RACI model help teams do?
options: Clarify who does what on tasks
